13.content:
It was a stormy day. Rain was splashing against the window's so hard that it seemed it would never get dry again. Every now and then you saw a stroke of lightning followed by some thunder. The wind blow hard with the cold of the winter in it. The streets were empty what was't strange.
Everyone looked for their warm houses. A big fire was burning in the fire place of a normal house hold. The youngest girl in this house was watching T.V while eating chips from an extra large bag. Slowly she patted her belly.
Her father was busy putting more wood on the fire. The young twins were busy drawing on paper, cutting of paper and glue it together.
Suddenly they heard a scream and their mother ran in.

"It's terrible. I just stepped on the scale and i gained two pounds. Two whole pounds."

Jessie just blew some hair out of her face. She thought her mother was way too worried about her weight. What was so bad about having some extra pounds. She knew she had a few and did't mind them.

"Honey. Don't worry so much. Or do you think i will love you less if you weigh more. It only means that there is more of you too love."

"No i do worry! I don't want too end up like a fat blob! From now on i'm going on a diet!"

Jessie lost her attention to what she was watching, her dad dropped some wood and even Bobby and Robbie forget the paper for a moment.

"Oh don't be scared. I'm going on a diet. Not you. Besides you three are still growing." She said and looked at her kids. "From now on i eat less and healthy. You all can keep eating normal."

Jessie focused on the T.V again. She loved food and her mother was great at cooking. She also ate everything so a diet where you could't eat delicious food sounded terrible too her. But now she heard that she did't have too follow the diet she did't really cared. She did't know that this was also going to affect her life.
Bobby and Robbie focused their attention back too their paper. Her father put a last piece of wood on the fire and walked over too Jessie.

"So how is Casper doing it at scare school?" He asked friendly.

"Not so good dad. Casper is just way too nice to be a scary ghost." Jessie said not losing her attention to the T.V for a second.

Jessie ate the last chips from the bag and felt her round belly. She wondered what would happen now her mother decided too lose weight.

She picked up another and pushed it in her mouth just like the other two and with some trouble she chowed him down. Now for the last. Slowly she took a bite. And another and another. Her belly started to hurt. But she kept eating. She was alway's told to never threw away good food.
She remembered pictures of underfed kids in third world countries. With big bellies. When she first saw it she thought it was about fat kids who ate too much but her mother told her that that was't the problem. Those kids got not enough food since they had't enough food. Since that moment she decided to always ate her food instead of throw it away since other kids had't enough.
Finally she swallowed the last bite and belched loudly. She smiled widely. She had done it. All burgers were in her tummy.

Jessie stood up an ran too the T.V. Her father bought a bunch of Disney DVD's a few days ago and since it was vacation they were watching one every evening or during the day since the weather was so bad lately and it did't seemed to be getting any better. More worse.

Jessie did't thought anything of it and ate her popcorn while watching the movie.

I was considering abortion. But when I dialed the number I got doubts. Inside me is something alive. All right maybe it's not alive yet but it's gonna be soon something that is alive and suddenly I did't want to lose it. I had a long talk with my parents and I decided to keep the baby. My parents agreed, but I need to finish high school. So I lived with them and together we took care of Sara. Believe me I'm happy I did."

"Are't you worried she'll once ask about her father?"

She handed Linda a cup of tea.
"Anyway Sara grew up to be... well you saw her. But she always had a big appetite but for some reason all her weight goes straight to her belly."

"Jessie's weight spreads around her body." Linda mumbled. "You know this all happened after I started dieting. I wanted to lose weight but my husband did't want me so I made look like I ate normal while I used her as a food disposer. Well she was always a little butterball but her appetite really increased and she started to get really fat but then she found out she liked it to be fat and wants to become fatter. I must admit she looks cute so fat."

"So perhaps I will see your more often in my mother's store."

"Sara is fast for someone with such a big belly."

"Yeah. It's sometimes a problem with friends. She sometimes accidentally knocks them over. Lucky your daughter is so heavy. Then she won't be knocked over so fast."

"What do you think about your daughters weight?" Linda asked curious.

"Not to much. Let her live her life. people are all so negative about fat but most people are fat and are still alive. So it can't be that bad. Besides it's perfect for my mothers store."

133.content:
Without anything to eat, Casper's antics soon got dull. Looking around, she saw her brothers were too occupied with their doodling to play, and her dad was on his phone, so she eased herself off the sofa and wandered out of the room. In the kitchen, she found her mother occupied with preparing dinner.
"Mom. Mom, I'm hungry." She reached out and tugged on Linda's sleeve.
"Not now, Jessie. You just had some crisps, wait until dinner."
"But Mom! I'm hungry." She saw her mother's face turn to irritation. "I promise to eat all my dinner..." she whined.
"Fine, fine, if you'll leave me alone for a while. Go grab something from the cupboard."
This was how almost all arguments with her mother ended; Jessie had quickly learned that a bit of whining and pestering always got her a snack from her mom, and maybe a drink of soda if she was lucky.
She wandered over to the snacks cupboard and opened it, quickly spying a family pack of M&M's. She grabbed it and hurried out of the room before it could be taken off her, jogged quickly up the stairs and into her room. Sitting on her bed to catch her breath, she leant back against the wall and began to eat great handfuls of M&M's in between deep gulps for air. Although she wasn't quite chubby, she had a slightly rounded middle from a hundred or so extra chocolates over the years, and she was extraordinarily unfit. Whereas most six year olds enjoyed running around and playing tag, she had always preferred sitting down, eating something or talking to her friend Emily. As a result, even climbing the stairs quickly was tiring, though worth it for the reward of chocolate.
Before she knew it, the M&M's were gone, the entire family size pack vanished into her growing stomach, and lay down across her bed, groaning; now she had stopped eating, her belly had begun aching from all the sugar and chocolate. She rubbed her swollen gut mournfully, then undid the button on her shorts to allow it some more room. A bit of the pressure released, she felt more comfortable, and quickly she began to feel very tired.
Well; it wasn't like she had anything to do before dinner. She closed her eyes, and quickly dropped off to sleep.
133.title: Chocolate Thief.

choices: She wakes up late at night
1331.content:
"Jessie. Jessie, wake up." The voice echoed through her sleeping mind, and reluctantly she opened her eyes. Her mom was standing over her, hands on hips. "Jessie, did you eat all the M&M's?" she asked.
"Uh, it was only half full." She lied.
Her mom glanced sceptically at her swollen belly.
"Well, if you say so. I only hope you can eat your dinner after all that chocolate though; I made burgers."
Suddenly reenergised, she rolled out of bed and onto her feet, leading the way downstairs in a hurry. In the kitchen, her dad and brothers were sitting patiently at the table, and as soon as Jessie sat down they were all served.
Jessie tucked into her burger with gusto, taking large bites at an impressive rate for a six year old, quickly finishing her first burger. She sat back in her chair, pleasantly full, but before she knew it Linda has scooped another burger onto her plate.
"I'm full up." She objected, but her mom shook her head.
"Oh. I thought that you said that you'd eat your whole dinner if I let you have a snack. I suppose I'll just have to make you wait for dinner next time..."
"Um, I've changed my mind, I am still hungry actually." The young girl said, taking an exaggerated bite from her new burger.
"Oh good." Said her mom. "I don't want anything lying around that could distract me from my diet." Her meal was just a salad.
Under Linda's watchful eye, Jessie choked down the second burger. Her stomach, filled to bursting with chips, candy and burger, was aching every time she moved, but she had to finish or she's never get snacks again! Finally, she gulped down the final fragment of meat and pushed the plate away, groaning. She rubbed her aching belly, now regretting the M&Ms.
"Dessert!" Linda announced, carrying through a huge bowl of caramel ice cream. "Who wants some?"
Had it been anything else, Jessie would have said no. However, caramel ice cream was her favourite food in the world, and saying no to it was practically blasphemy.
"I'll have a bit." Said Jessie, then gasped as a huge scoop was dumped into her bowl. Still, she pulled out her spoon and dug in, simultaneously wincing in pain and smiling in pleasure as every mouthful slid smoothly down into her stretching stomach. Even with her pants still unbuttoned, they were still tight around her distended belly, the stitching groaning as it was put through ordeals it was never meant to suffer.
Finally, the last scoop-full slid away, and dropped her spoon feeling slightly sick. Making her excuses, she stumbled out of the room, collapsing onto the sofa in the living room with a gasp and a moan. She really shouldn't eat so much... But she couldn't resist...
1331.title: Stuffed as a Christmas Turkey

13312.content:
"Jessie?" Her mom called through the next day just after lunch. She'd woken in her own bed that morning, having been carried there by her dad the night before without even stirring.
Reluctantly, she slid off the sofa where she'd been digesting a large meal of cheese sandwiches and trotted to where Linda was reading a diet magazine at the kitchen table.
"Yes?"
"I've invited your friend Emily round to play this afternoon, and she's going to be staying the night while her parents go out. Is that okay?"
"A sleepover? Yay!" The young girl beamed. Emily was her best friend, and a sleepover with her sounded like great fun. "Can we have popcorn? And watch a movie? And drink soda?"
Her mom laughed at her excitement.
"Sure, let's all three of us go out shopping and you two can choose a film you want to watch, okay?"
"Okay! When's she getting here?"
"In about an hour. How about you go and play, and I'll call you when she gets here?"
Following her mom's advice, Jessie went and played in her room for an hour. However, the moment she heard the doorbell ring she shot downstairs, arriving at the door at the same time as Linda, though breathing quite heavily. Exercise was a thing she tried to avoid as much as possible, so even running to the door was a challenge for her unfit frame.
A second later, her mother clicked up the latch and opened the door, revealing behind it both Emily and her mom. Emily's mother was a large, slightly simple woman who enjoyed good food and good gossip above all else; even before she had got inside the door, she had started regaling Linda with a "scandalous" story involving the lady who lived just down the road. Emily, aged six like Jessie, was already looking slightly embarrassed by her mother's gushing manner, and took the opportunity to follow her friend inside to the sitting room.
"Hey Emily!" Started Jessie. "Guess what; mom says you get to stay all night and watch a movie!"
The other girl smiled shyly. She was rather diffident, and even though she had known Jessie for years, still behaved slightly timidly when faced by Jessie's occasionally overbearing manner.
"That sounds fun."
"I know! And we get to eat popcorn and drink soda!" She was very excited about that; buttered or sugared popcorn was another of Jessie's favourite foods. "Also we're gonna go out to the shops in a bit and choose the film and stuff."
"Okay. I'll-" she began, but was cut off as Linda popped her head into the room.
"Come say goodbye to your mommy, dear." She said, causing Emily to blush and follow her out of the room without finishing her sentence.
After they had said their farewells, Emily and Linda returned to the sitting room.
"So, you want to go to the supermarket now, or would you rather play a while first?"
13312.title: Sleepover!

133121.content:
"Let's go now!" Jessie said excitedly. Linda looked at Emily.
"Are you okay with that, Emily?" She asked, and received a mute nod in return. "Great, let's get going then."
She lead the way out to the car and unlocked it, and Jessie climbed into her car seat before being strapped in by Linda. She then got the spare car seat out the boot for Emily and put it in the car, letting the six year old get into the seat. Or rather, try to get into the seat; Emily was a plump girl, fat clinging to her hips and midsection from years of large meals, and the arm-rests on the seat were just too narrow to allow her to slip her wide rear onto the seat. The moment she realized, Emily went red as a fire hydrant and began squirming in a desperate attempt to squeeze into the seat.
"It's okay, dear, that's our old one, I can-" Linda started, but stopped as suddenly something gave, letting Emily fall with a thump into the seat. "Ah. Erm, are you okay there?"
The chubby girl nodded vigorously, eyes down turned, still bright red.
"If you're sure..." Linda reached into the car and began strapping the young girl into place. However, she soon reached another issue. "Er, Emily? Could you, ah, please suck in your stomach for a moment?" Linda had two clips in hand, but although she strained and pulled, they were a good three inches away from connecting over the child's swollen midsection.
Somehow turning an even deeper shade of crimson, she obliged, allowing Jessie's mom to snap the clip into place with a puff of exertion. When Emily let her breath out, the clip visibly strained, but it held.
"Well, there we go then." Said Linda, forcing a smile. "Let's set off." She felt truly sorry for her daughter's friend; it must be horrible being so large at such a young age. What made it worse is that she'd watched the process happen over the last few years, the child going from average baby to chubby toddler, before being fed into her corpulent state of today by her overbearing mother.
Thank goodness nothing like that could happen to her daughter!
133121.title: Car-seat difficulties.
